author: sarowe
msg: IntelliJ IDEA configuration: Added *.dat to list of patterns of resources to copy to the compiler output directory; fixed typo in .idea/workspace.xml that misidentified the module for the kuromoji run configuration.

author: sarowe
msg: * added "*.dat" to list of resources that gets copied to compilation output directory
* alphabetized kuromoji in the modules list
* Moved compiler output directory to build/contrib/analyzers/kuromoji-idea/, because IntelliJ includes tools in the output, where the Ant build instead creates a separate output directory for tools
* Added pom.xml and *.iml to list of svn:ignore patterns for lucene/contrib/analyzers/kuromoji/.

author: hwright
msg: Ev2 shims: When fetching the base file in the working copy, just use the
pristine, rather than creating a separate copy of it.
(svn_wc__fetch_base_func): Use the pristine filename, if we have one.
